mathayiye..mama nan hithanne mekata aarthikamaya paththata wada samajayiya gataluwakata labuna uththarayak kiyala.kawuru kohoma nirwachanaya karath.ithaliyeth man danna bahutharaya wenwimata kamathiyi.mulikama hethuwa widiyata owunuth dakwanne nagenahira yuropiya sankraramanika prajawa saha owunge nithiwirodhi kriya kalapaya.podi udaharanayak..ape gewal awata man danna tharamin mathjawaram karuwan 5 denek innawa.in 4k rumeniyan.in dennekma sorakam walata sambandhayi.ekek ithali.ithali jathikaya nithiyata baya wunath rumeniyan ehema na.mona gema gahuwath bodar pannama hewili boru.thawa jawaramak thamayi wahana/bayik ussala nagenahira yuropayata patawima.eelangata gewal bindum mankollakam 90% tama wagakiyanne nagenahira yuropiya dayasporawa.thawath prashnayak nagenahira paththen ena ahiguntika janathawa.mulikawa owun jiwanamargaya sorakama.podu prawahana sewaye danwim dana tharamatama prashnaya ugra wela."kotinma iththawage gedarata aawa kaballawage kes eka"samanyayen man ahapu bahutharayama kiwwe kanna bonna nathath samakami pirisidu rataka jiwathwuna owunta me wena wenaswima daraganna ba kiyala.meka thunwani panthiye gatumakata wada deyak methana thiyanawa.sankramanikayan bahula pradesha wala
